citations.desc: INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Item IACUC 2.31 1 iii
At the time of inspection protocol 03-1194 was reviewed. The investigator failed to document that the activities do
not unnecessarily duplicate previous activities.
The investigator needs to provide to the IACUC documentation that the activities do not unnecessarily duplicate
previous activities.
Inspection took place over 2 days 7/15-16/15
An exit interview took place with facility representative at the end of inspection .
